treatment.description: Leaf blades mostly 5–10 cm. Ray laminae 10–15 mm. Cypselae 5–6 mm. 2n = 66 (South America).
treatment.discussion: Pascalia glauca evidently has been introduced into southeastern United States repeatedly. It seems not to have persisted in the flora.
